revised_title: Crystallographic and Optical Study of Ammonium Ferrous Sulphate and its Alkali-Metal Isomorphs
tldr: The author investigates the crystallographic and optical properties of ammonium ferrous sulphate and its alkali-metal isomorphs, providing a detailed study of their habits, growth patterns, and optical characteristics. The research also explores the influence of alkali-metal bases on the crystal habits and the effect of magnetic fields on crystal growth.
